name: Valhalla Validation Classes for PHP
short_description: Valhalla is a set of PHP classes designed to ease the burden of common input filtering in web-based scripts. Valhalla is built for speedy development and is a flexible and extensible base for creating solid, reliable input filters for day-to-day use.
